<title level="1" right="Spell 2" pfs="Standard">[Magic Mouth](/Spells.aspx?ID=181)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Auditory" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=16" />
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
<trait label="Visual" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=163" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 349 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Deity**
[Nethys](/Deities.aspx?ID=12)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 creature or object
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** unlimited
</row>

</column>

---

You specify a [trigger](/Rules.aspx?ID=301) and a message up to 25 words long. When the specified trigger occurs within 30 feet of the target, an illusory mouth appears on the target and speaks the message, and the _magic mouth_ spell ends.
